item.title: RBLX
item.description: score:153 Chances: Roblox stock has cleared a buy point following a bullish Wall Street call. RBLX stock has been on a strong recent run, rising around 74%. Wells Fargo initiates coverage of the gaming platform Roblox (RBLX) with an “Overweight” rating on the stock and a price target of $49 per share.
